resources.string: Thank you for contacting me. Please leave a message I will get back to you as soon as possible.
Thank you for contacting Nimo Naturals. Please leave a message on one of our platforms and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
You attempted to call Dave but I could not receive your call. I will call you as soon as possible. Keep safe.

1. Go to the M-pesa Menu.
 2. Select Send money.
 3. Enter Phone number +254 716 060198.
 4. Enter the Amount.
 5. Enter your M-Pesa PIN then send.
Get 1200 sms + 500 free sms for 1000 Kshs
